content: basic stocking stitch creates a touchably smooth texture in this beginner-friendly knit blanket featuring a thick and cushy yarn worked flat with simple knit and purl stitches our super-plush bernat blanket extra thick works up quickly so this project seems to fly off your needles this voluminous throw looks great in any shade and will add a perfect accent of warmth to your space yarn for model bernat® blanket extra thick™ 21 2 oz/600 g 72 yds/66 m pink dust 62012 4 balls or 238 yds/218 m materials size u s 50 25 mm circular knitting needle 36 91 5 cm long
